availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary "Polly" Grimsley Meek in Warren County, Kentucky, in September 1840. Father of Angeline Meek, Ann Eliza Meek, Mary J. Meek, William T. Meek, Narcissa Meek, Artemesia Meek, John S. Meek, Samuel Meek, Jasper R. Meek, and James F. Meek. Farmer in Warren County in 1850. Farmer in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No 2, p. 119A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No 1, p. 781.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film #000164006.
"William Meek (1810-1887)," Find A Grave, Memorial #22099406, Accessed June 30, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22099406.
